import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import '../public/style/components/header.css' import { Row, Col, Menu } from 'antd' import Router from 'next/router' import Link from 'next/link' import axios from 'axios' import api from '../config/api' import { AndroidOutlined, CustomerServiceOutlined, DribbbleOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' const Header = () => { const [navBar, setNavBar] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const result = await axios('getTypeInfo').then(res => { return res.data.data }) setNavBar(result) } fetchData(); }, []) return (
超级牛 一个超级牛的小伙子 首页 视频 生活
) } export default Header
